import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import React,{useState} from "react"; import "./_filled-cart.scss" const FilledCart = ()=>{ const cart = useSelector(state => state.cr); const[shipppingCharges,setShippingCharges]=useState(0); return(
{ cart.cartItems.map((item)=>{ return(
{item.product_name}
${item.price}
-
0
+
Remove Item
) }) }

Summary

Cart Total : ${cart.totalItemsPrice} Shipping Charges : Free
Total : ${cart.totalItemsPrice+shipppingCharges}
Checkout
) } export default FilledCart;
